item.title: ESP8266 Talking to AWS IoT Using MQTT
item.description: Arduino library connecting to the AWS IoT service from an ESP8266 using websockets and MQTT. GitHub: debsahu/esp8266-arduino-aws-iot-ws ⚠️ ⚠️ ⚠️ This is no longer maintained and obsolete, there is better way to do this: follow instructions from here Still want to use this, follow instructions below ⚠️ ⚠️ ⚠️ Arduino Library derived from joekickass/esp8266-arduino-aws-iot-ws to work with Arduino Dependencies Library Link Use arduinoWebSockets https://github.
